sense.def:
Izraz
mine
pove, da nekaj pripada govorcu ali piscu.

seg.quote: Margaret was a very old friend of mine.
I took her hands in mine.
He gave it to me, it's mine.

sense.def:
A mine
je kraj, kjer ljudje kopljejo globoko v zemljo, da bi našli premog, diamante ali zlato.

To mine a substance
pomeni iz zemlje s kopanjem v globino pridobivati določeno snov, na primer premog ali zlato.

seg.quote: They mine their own coal and ore.

sense.def:
A mine
je tudi eksploziven predmet, ki je zakopan v zemlji ali plava na vodi, in ga raznese, ko se ga kaj dotakne.
